

\beginhymn Dona nobis pacem.

%\sidx{Grant unto us peace}

\begingroup

\resetlayout

\def\notes{\vnotes1}%semiquavers
\def\Notes{\vnotes2}%quavers
\def\NOtes{\vnotes3}%crotchets
\def\NOTes{\vnotes4}%dotcrot
\def\NOTEs{\vnotes5}%minims
\def\NOTES{\vnotes6}%dotminims

\def\lati#1{\cchar{-7}{#1}}
\def\engl#1{\cchar{-12}{\itlyrics #1}}

\rmlyrics

%\setstaffs1{1}
\setclef1{\treble}
\smallmusicsize
%\interstaff{14}
\generalsignature{-1}
\generalmeter{\meterfrac34}
\startpiece
\Notes\lchar{10}{I}\lati{Do}\ibu1{f}{-6}\qb1{f}\en
\Notes\engl{Grant}\lati{-}\tb1\qb1{c}\en
\NOTEs\lati{na}\ha{'a}\en
\bar
\Notes\lati{no}\ibu1{g}{-7}\qb1{g}\en
\Notes\engl{unto us}\lati{-}\tb1\qb1{c}\en
\NOTEs\lati{bis}\ha{'b}\en
\bar
\NOtes\lati{pa}\qa{'a}\en

\NOtes\lati{cem,}\qa{f}\en
\bar

\nextline
